duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team to grow and drive on-time renewals and work along with other positions within the Customer Success and Sales organizations.
Manage quoting analysts responsible for quote creation and revision to execute on a predefined set of key performance indicators.

Ensure compliance with company policies for quoting of renewal orders and act as a liaison to renewal management team to ensure customer subscription and product data is captured for creation of customer renewal quotes.
Support, train, and evaluate improvement opportunities for Renewal Quoting Analysts & maintain required documentation.
Drive effectiveness to reduce overall time spent on tasks related to renewal quote creation/revision by identifying improvements to the quoting processes and tools.
Ensure achievement of on-time, accurate, and actionable renewal quote creation, revisions, and other key metrics.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years' experience in an Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization
